cmd.error.permission: <red>You don't have permission for this command.
cmd.error.player-only: <red>This command can only be executed by a player.
cmd.error.console-only: <red>This command can only be executed by the console.
cmd.error.args.rulestatus: <dark_red>{0}<red> is not a valid rule status, try <dark_red>ALLOW <red>or <dark_red>DENY<red>.
cmd.error.args.selectiontype: <dark_red>{0}<red> is not a valid selection type, try <dark_red>CUBOID <red>or <dark_red>POLY<red>.
cmd.select.expand: <gray>Selection has been expanded on the vertical axis.
cmd.select.undo: <gray>Your last selection action has been undone
cmd.select.wand: <gray>The selection wand has been added to your inventory
cmd.select.worldborder: <gray>The world border bounds are now your selection.
select.wand.name: <yellow>Selection Wand
cmd.regions.create.error.poly-invalid: <red>A polygon selection may not be complex (edges must not cross).
cmd.regions.create.error.exists: <red>A region with that name already exists.
cmd.regions.list: <gray>List of regions in your current world: <green>{0}</green>.</gray>
cmd.regions.rules.add.error.exists: <red>A rule that does the same already exists.
cmd.regions.rules.remove.error.index: <red>A rule with that index does not exist.
cmd.tiles.create.error.intersect: <red>There can only be one tile region at a given location.
cmd.tiles.attributes.set: <gray>Changed attribute <green>{0}</green> to <green>{1}</green> for the tile at your position.
cmd.attributes.set: <gray>Changed attribute <green>{0}</green> to <green>{1}</green> for <green>{2}</green> regions and <green>{3}</green> tiles within your selection.
